summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and regulating the design, construction, materials, demolition, maintenance, alteration, use and occupancy of buildings and improvements incident thereto; adopting the Uniform Building Code as the Seattle Building Code; providing for the administration thereof; requiring permits; and repealing Ordinances 4635, 83843, 84905, 85500, 96821, 98900, 102929, and all other ordinances in conflict herewith.
